channel.title: I need help lol
channel.description:
ok this are pretty much just questions of things i want to code on my server.
1. how do i add commands say in quest tab? like say i want to add modzone and teleports how can i do? and make sure only the right player rights are allowed?
2. how can i make say a staffmeeting command, but that teleblocks them tell say i do meetingdone? (if this is possible)
3. how do i change exp for non combat skills? like mining, farming, theiving, blah blah?
4. how can i make say perfect rings so only admins up can use? the code i used before only allowed one player right to use, but i want it admin up
5. tyvm for your help in advance, and hopefully ya can help meh =)
